nodes.excerpt: Airdocs is a document generation service for Airtable. Create smart, beautiful-looking documents from your data. The drag-and-drop designer gives you ultimate control of your documents. Send your documents to another app or store them back in Airtable.
nodes.title: Airdocs - Generate documents from Airtable
nodes.author: Josh Mamroud

nodes.excerpt: Pack of 7 high-quality 3D plant illustrations that can be edited in Figma or in Blender.
nodes.title: 3D Plant Illustrations - Cute 3D plants for your design project
nodes.author: Nikola

nodes.excerpt: Easily create linear, radial, and conic gradients that avoid the dreaded "gray zone" in the middle of many gradients. Export as CSS or SVG.
nodes.title: Gradient Generator - Create perceptually smooth gradients of all types
nodes.author: Erik D. Kennedy

nodes.excerpt: A text editor where you can type dialogues, add emotions (crying, shouting, hatred, polite, out of breath, etc.). Select from a set of voices (hero, villain, AI, merchant, kid, etc.), add background effects, and export as a human-like voice in studio quality.
nodes.title: SimpleSounds - Human-like AI voices
nodes.author: Tanay Rathore

nodes.excerpt: Universal Icon Set v2.0 is finally ready. 1671 icons in total. High-quality icon set for websites, apps, social networks, prints, billboards and even for a postcard for your mom.
nodes.title: Universal Icon Set 2.0 - 557 icons in 3 styles

nodes.excerpt: OneSimpleApi was born out of the idea that there should be a simple way of achieving complex features, when working with no-code tools. A toolbox, where you can find all the APIs that will make your creation go the extra mile: Just... One Simple API.
nodes.title: OneSimpleApi.com - The first API toolkit for no-coders
nodes.author: Pablius

nodes.excerpt: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
nodes.title: SVG Color Matrix Mixer - Generate nice looking color matrix filters for your images
nodes.author: Rik Schennink

nodes.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
nodes.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work
